General.Name: Ko Ja Cayman Co Ltd
General.Description: Ko Ja (Cayman) Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells membrane touch switches in Taiwan, Mainland China, and internationally. It also engages in the general investment activities; sale of chemical raw materials; and provision of management services and optoelectronic products, as well as manufactures and sells backlight parts of keyboards and electroconduction slurry. Ko Ja (Cayman) Co., Ltd. was founded in 1975 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.168, Liancheng Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 23553
